department: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC/TPSGC)
full_summary:
[**Request for Standing Offer: Bulk Aviation Fuel**](#request-for-standing-offer-bulk-aviation-fuel)

### Tender Information

*   **Reference Number:** WS3761283182-Doc4410709720
*   **Amendment Number:** 2
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS3761283182
*   **Publication Date:** 24 January 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 09 February 2024 at 14:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** 31 March 2025
*   **Tender Status:** Expired

### Notice Type and Procurement Method

This is a [**Request for Standing Offer**](#request-for-standing-offer) (RFSO) notice, issued in accordance with the [**Trade Agreement**](#trade-agreement) and the [**Government Procurement Policy**](#government-procurement-policy). The procurement method for this RFSO is **competitive and open bidding**.

### Description and Scope

**Note:** The RFSO number has been modified to clarify that only previous RFSO E60HL-230052/D remains in effect. The amendment calls for clarification along with the resumption of the deadline closing under the original issuance of the initial tender: to submit requirements on February 9th, 14:00 est ('returns submitted after closing time' may lose its linkage). Bidders and stakeholders are encouraged to modify their strategies and submit via other means or schedule submissions for the preceding end-of-business-day, ensuring their quotes are accounted for.

### Contracting Entities

The Contracting Entity is the [**Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**](#standards). The contracting entity address is:

*   11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
*   Gatineau, QC

### Notice URL

This note can be accessed at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18609410?extsite=MTg2MDk0MTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18609410?extsite=MTg2MDk0MTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
